attacks.name: Heat Breath
attacks.description: Spews a very hot breath of flames at enemies in front.

attacks.name: Fire Tower
attacks.description: Attack that results in a pillar of flame erupting at the target's feet.

attacks.name: Firewall
attacks.description: Attack that surrounds the attacker with a wall of fire.

attacks.name: Burning Heart
attacks.description: Enflames the hearts of allies, boosting their strength.

attacks.name: Inferno
attacks.description: Attack that surrounds the attacker with the flames of hell.

attacks.name: Magma Bomb
attacks.description: Rains bolts of lava from the sky, dealing enemies much damage.

attacks.name: Flame Storm
attacks.description: Raises a storm of flames, dealing much damage to a wide range of enemies.

attacks.name: Bubble Breath
attacks.description: Bathes enemies in front in a powerful water breath attack.

attacks.name: Hail Spear
attacks.description: Attack that raises painfully sharp icicles from under the target's feet.

attacks.name: Splash
attacks.description: Attack that blasts enemies in front with water at high pressure.

attacks.name: Waterfall
attacks.description: Attack that drops in a flow of high-pressure water on the target's head.

attacks.name: Heavy Rain
attacks.description: Attack that brings powerful torrential rains to a wide area.

attacks.name: Ice Statue
attacks.description: Attack that results in giant icicles erupting at the target's feet.

attacks.name: Aurora Freeze
attacks.description: Raises a powerful blizzard of water and ice, dealing much damage to a wide range of enemies.

attacks.name: Electric Chute
attacks.description: Shoots a ball of energy at enemies.

attacks.name: Wing Shoes
attacks.description: Sends a pleasing wind to the feet of you and your allies, increasing speed.

attacks.name: Wind Cutter
attacks.description: Attack that looses a cutting whirlwind at the target.

attacks.name: Electric Cloud
attacks.description: Attacks with strikes of lightning from thunderclouds gathered over the target's head.

attacks.name: Tailwind
attacks.description: Sends a powerful wind to the feet of you and your allies, increasing speed.

attacks.name: Thunderstorm
attacks.description: Shoots lightning from all directions, dealing much damage to a wide range of enemies.

attacks.name: Hurricane
attacks.description: Raises a powerful hurricane, dealing much damage to a wide range of enemies.

attacks.name: Poison Powder
attacks.description: Attacks enemies in front with a poisonous mist.

attacks.name: Earth Coat
attacks.description: Wraps you and your allies in stone, increasing stamina.

attacks.name: Bio Field
attacks.description: Attack that surrounds the attacker with a poisonous mist.

attacks.name: Root Bind
attacks.description: Attack that brings forth a clinging ivy to cover the victim.

attacks.name: Rock Fall
attacks.description: Attack that drops giant boulders on the target's head.

attacks.name: Earth Power
attacks.description: Wraps attacker and allies in stone, increasing stamina.

attacks.name: Venom Disaster
attacks.description: Brings forth a tornado of poisonous mist, dealing much damage to a wide range of enemies.

attacks.name: Dark Spirit
attacks.description: Shoots a ball of darkness at enemies.

attacks.name: Blackout
attacks.description: Brings forth a dark mist to the surroundings, dealing damage to enemies.

attacks.name: Nightmare
attacks.description: Brings forth an eye of darkness, whose stare deals damage, from above the victim's head.

attacks.name: Chaos Cloud
attacks.description: Attacks enemies in front with dark energy.

attacks.name: Shadow Fall
attacks.description: Drops bolts of dark energy down on the target's head.

attacks.name: Hide and Seek
attacks.description: Attacks a wide range of enemies with a dark fear that turns enemy anger to allied Digimon.

attacks.name: Evil Squall
attacks.description: Brings forth powerful dark energy, dealing much damage to a wide range of enemies.

attacks.name: Light Soul
attacks.description: Shoots a ball of light energy at enemies.

attacks.name: Saint Ray
attacks.description: Attack that drops a column of light on the target's head.

attacks.name: Holy Breath
attacks.description: Increases the stamina and speed of allies.

attacks.name: Flash
attacks.description: Deals damage to enemies by exploding them from within with light.

attacks.name: Saint Shield
attacks.description: Deals damage to area around target with a dome of light.

attacks.name: Judgement
attacks.description: Attacks enemies with an extra powerful laser of judgement.

attacks.name: Shining Nova
attacks.description: Fills the surrounding area with light energy, dealing much damage to enemies.

attacks.name: The World
attacks.description: ZA WARUDO! TOKI WO TOMARE!
